info.name: Type Cell
info.summary: TypeCell is a fresh take on what documents and software can look like. Think Notion + Jupyter Notebooks
info.description:
Break-free from your tools with hackable software Why can't we easily insert interactive elements like charts, maps or anything else you can think of into our documents? Modern software is incredibly powerful. But as users, we're limited by the use-cases envisioned by its creators.
Hackable, or Malleable software, puts users in control by making tools customizable with End-User Programming.
Use TypeCell to create and share your knowledge base of live, interactive documents. With Code Blocks, you always have a powerful programming environment at your fingertips.
info.author: Ladislav Gazo
